author: Analysis by Lauren Dezenski, CNN
title: The general election is here!
description: With the conventions and the summer behind us, the traditional start of the general election has arrived. And today, North Carolina began sending out ballots to voters.

title: Jacob Blake appears via video from hospital bed in court appearance
description: Jacob Blake, the Wisconsin man who was shot seven times in the back by an officer as Kenosha police attempted to arrest him, appeared from his hospital bed via video during his first court appearance on unrelated charges.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
source.name: CNN

author: Leah Asmelash, CNN
title: No, a Black man didn't invent the light bulb. But Lewis Howard Latimer made it better
description: On Thursday, presidential candidate Joe Biden claimed that a Black man had invented the light bulb, not "a White guy named Edison."
content:

author: David Williams, CNN
title: A Canadian court rules a mom can send her son to school despite his dad's Covid-19 fears
description: A judge in Canada sided with a mother who wants her son to attend school in person this year, despite the father's concerns about Covid-19.
content:

author: Eva Tapiero, Martin Gaëlle Fournier and Sara Spary, CNN
title: 'Death should be democratic': Why this ill French man plans to live stream his dying days
description: A French man with an incurable illness who unsuccessfully lobbied President Emmanuel Macron to allow him to die by "active medical assistance" says he is planning to live stream his own death on Facebook.
source.name: CNN
